casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

November 13, 2009

[Cite as 11/13/2009 Case Announcements, 2009-Ohio-5973.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-1368. Hance v. Allstate Ins. Co.

Clermont App. No. CA2008-10-094, 2009-Ohio-2809. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for leave to file an untimely certified conflict,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
